description.value:
Homid is the Garou’s human form, allowing them to move among mortal society without revealing their true nature.

In this form, a Garou appears fully human and is unaffected by the Delirium. Homid form is best suited for social interaction, subtlety, and operating within civilization.

While in Homid form, the Garou’s connection to Rage is muted, but their ability to pass unnoticed among humans is unmatched.

While in Homid Form:

• You retain your humanoid appearance.

• You can speak, cast spells, and manipulate equipment normally.

• You may not use natural weapons granted by other forms.

• This form does not grant combat bonuses.

While in Homid (humanoid form) form, you gain the following benefits and limitations.

Speed: 30 feet

Benefits:

• You cna speak, manipulate objects, and wield equipment normally

• You can spend Gnosis normally

Limitations:

• You cannot use your Claw or Bite natural weapons in this form
